column5: Programme descriptionTaking the science of sound as your focus, you’ll work in a cross-disciplinary environment. You will use theoretical and experimental work to explore the musical, technical and multimedia applications of acoustics and audio technology.The emphasis of this programme is on science and technology in the context of musical and multimedia applications.The programme aims to:
column7: Tuition fees vary between degree programmes. Find the specific fees for your chosen programme on our website.
